job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: <strong><u>Minimum Qualifications<br></u></strong><ul><li>Master's degree in statistics, economics,operations research, engineering, or related field</li><li>4+ years of experience in MMM, measurement, A/Btesting, marketing strategy &amp; analytics</li><li>Proficient coding skills (Python/SQL) anddatabase knowledge</li><li>Extensive experience with predictive modelingalgorithms</li><li>Strong project management skills</li><li>Communicate technical material to a range ofaudiences and to ‘tell a story’ that provides insight into the business</li><li>You have a passion for working in a fast-pacedagile environment.</li><li>A collaborative mindset and sense of curiosity</li></ul>
